products.title: Cyberpunk 2077 Johnny Silverhand (Ver. 2) Action Figure
products.description: McFarlane's Johnny Silverhand figure features him wearing his iconic outfit from the Cyberpunk 2077 video game. This figure has been designed with ultra articulation and features 22 moving parts. The 7-inch scale figure comes witha Base, Malorian Gun, and a Duffle Bag with Atomic Bomb. This figure comes packaged in a Cyberpunk 2077-themed window box.
features: Based on the video game Cyberpunk 2077
Designed with ultra articulation and features 22 moving parts
